name: 陳昭榮
objective:
一、線性連立方程式。二、矩陣基本運算。三、行列式。四、向量空間。
五、內積空間。六、線性轉換。七、特徵值與特徵向量
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹
Week 2: 數學證明概述 (Appendix)
Week 3: Systems of Linear Equations (Chapter 1)
Week 4-5: Matrices (Chapter 2)
Week 6-7: Determinants (Chapter 3)、期中考
Week 8-10: Vector Spaces (Chapter 4)
Week 11-13: Inner Product Spaces (Chapter 5)、期中考
Week 14-15: Linear Transformations (Chapter 6)
Week 16-17: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (Chapter 7)
Week 18: 期末考
materials:
使用教材：Ron Larson, Elementary Linear Algebra,7th Edition, 高立代理，2013。
參考教材：Steven J. Leon, Linear Algebra with applications, 7th Edition, 2008.
